name: SausageGame
0:
”Alexa, ask True Wisdom what is the meaning of life”
”Alexa, ask True Wisdom what is life”
”Alexa, ask True Wisdom who am I”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: true wisdom
des: This skill gives a simple answer to the any question. When asked any question, Sausage Game will respond with "sausage," just like in the popular childhood game. Just remember not to laugh, or you lose.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
